group_1.textLeft: So they're basically telling us to just do normal,@club-like stuff.

group_1.textRight: We did plan to do something like that, didn't we?@Publicizing something as a trio, for instance.
...Though I didn't expect to have demand for it this@soon after establishing the club.

group_1.textLeft: They've given us a budget and everything, so we@ought to make a proper effort, right?

group_1.textRight: Agreed! I want to show off what I'm capable of@when it really counts!

group_1.textLeft: In that case, how about exhibiting something at@the cultural festival?
Something that makes use of each of our fields of@expertise!

group_1.textRight: Each of our fields...@so literature in general, in my case.
Completely scattershot!@...Although it's hardly a surprise!

group_1.textLeft: Well, no point in grumbling about it. Let's try@finding common ground between them!
Yeah!@Or making a movie based on historical events.

group_1.textRight: Let's shoot a film based on real history!
Then we can screen it at the cultural festival!

group_1.textLeft: You mean... a historical drama film?

group_1.textRight: Komachi-senpai, I'd love it if you could research@period-accurate info for us!
I humbly request that Kira-SENSEI provide us@with an amazing script!
You were one of the final nominees for some sort@of award a while ago, right, senpai?!

group_1.textLeft: A lit magazine's "Rookie of the Year", if I recall. And@you definitely have an amazing talent for writing.
Although poems and novels are more your@specialty, I'm sure.
...I HAVE written a handful of plays, for what it's@worth.
If I'm restricted to writing a period piece, I'll@probably have my work cut out for me...
But if Komachi can vouch for the historical@accuracy, then perhaps.
...Just asking for posterity, but what are you@planning to do, Mihono?

group_1.textRight: Heh heh heh! Why, of course...
[chara:303901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Aaah!@You took the words out of my mouth!

group_1.narration: With the goal of publishing a@"film based on historical events" at the cultural festival...
...our Historical Research Club set out@on a brand new club activity.
